snippet: Speaking at Tulane University's Corporate Law Institute, Peter A. Weinberg said he and his firm believed that the assorted deal makers gathered here might not need to worry about the current stagnation of the mergers market.
abstract: Speaking at Tulane University's Corporate Law Institute, Peter A. Weinberg said he and his firm believed that the assorted deal makers gathered here might not need to worry about the current stagnation of the mergers market.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Perella Weinberg Founder Confident Deal-Making Will Return
